function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate categorization of study topics and designs leading to misinterpretation of data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale data collection and sharing may lead to potential privacy breaches and data security risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate morbidity and mortality of specific ethnic populations increases the risk of social and healthcare inequalities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative data sharing across multiple countries may lead to cross-border legal and regulatory challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited coverage of commercial covid-19 ehr data in regions outside north america","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in using data for research due to differing health record systems and local processes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete data capture due to rapid introduction of new coding and system burden","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of large-scale health data for research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumptions on quality assurance for clinical trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear endorsement of critical appraisal tools for research using ehr data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Little endorsement by medical journals on standards for publication of research utilizing ehrs or other real-world data sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited success in integrating routinely collected health-care data into clinical trial activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial non-capture of medical services in systems without electronic data capture","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low visibility into health inequities and limited engagement of diverse clinical research groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection bias in real-world evidence research and disparities in health-care use","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor recording of patients’ ethnicity and race in health data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data sharing in covid-19 research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in data sharing formats and standards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in sharing observational data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in sharing individual patient-level data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust in existing safeguards for research data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sharing medical data at the individual patient level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrequent audit and enforcement of data sharing by scientific journals and governing bodies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data reporting in trial registries and data sharing platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Concerns over global health inequities in data sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sharing clinical trial data during a global pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low percentage of trials published and results available","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of centralized, sponsor-driven primary data sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multifaceted reasons for non-data sharing, including unawareness of legal requirements and language barriers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scarcity of data sharing during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal frameworks for international research creating challenges in synthesising data assets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sociopolitical barriers to data sharing within and between institutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricted data access due to commercial or financial reasons","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data sharing for non-clinical trial data in covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reproducibility concern in clinical research, especially for digital-health technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fraudulent research activities related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased public engagement with emerging research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Timely and independenlty conducted reproducible analytics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data sharing and reporting in medical research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized and accessible data formats","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High variability and lack of monitoring in guidance for data sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid sharing of molecular data may lead to unintentional release of sensitive information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data collection and efforts may lead to ineffective management of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing technological, sociological, and operational barriers may hinder the impact of digital-health technologies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases to other individuals due to interaction with contributors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias or conflict of interest in the research due to the financial interests of contributors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreak of a novel coronavirus disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic recession","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability in globalized system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe restrictions to mobility exacerbating social inequalities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
